notes: Evil Prospectors will only spawn in [[Barren Drift]] after an unknown (but low) amount of [[Luminescent Crystal]]s is mined. When this happens they will spawn all around the cave as a raid. After being killed, they do not seem to respawn unless a new raid is triggered by mining more crystals.
abilities: {{Ability List| {{Melee|?}}|{{Ability|[[Life Drain]] on target|400-500|element=lifedrain}}|{{Ability|[[Energy Damage|Thunderstorm]] on itself|455+|element=energy}}|{{Ability|[[Holy Missile]] on target|400-500|element=holy}}|{{Ability|Reflects [[Fire Damage|Fire]],[[Energy Damage|Energy]] and [[Earth Damage]]|element=?}} }}
name: Evil Prospector
bestiarytext: Ghost-like remnants of individuals full of greed and evil to the core. Many of them foremen and overseers in life, they still come to check on their spectral workforce from time to time and help out lesser ghosts with their aggressive charges and furious attacks.
